com.tlswe.awsmock.common.util

Class TemplateUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tlswe.awsmock.common.util.TemplateUtils

  • public final class TemplateUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities that writes/gets string output from FreeMarker (http://freemarker.org/) templates. All templates are located under a folder named "templates" in the root folder which is relative to where this class is in the classpath. In case of any errors during processing such as TemplateException or FileNotFoundException (missing template), an AwsMockException wrapping the original exception will be raised.
